content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28, -61) and wooden chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position -26.5, -59.5) moving items to stone furnace (position -25, -59)
- Burner inserter (position -23.5, -58.5) moving items to storage chest (position -22.5, -58.5)

### Secondary Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18, -53) and wooden chest (position -17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position -16.5, -51.5) moving items to stone furnace (position -15, -51)
- Burner inserter (position -13.5, -50.5) moving items to storage chest (position -12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41, -82)
- Wooden chest for coal storage (position 41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation Complex
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 11073, 11075)
- Electric pole network connecting various entities

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (position 5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter (position 6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 (position 8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

### Research Lab Setup
Lab present but position not specified in data, connected to electricity network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Check if items are actually present in the chest before attempting to extract
- Verify the correct chest position when attempting extraction
- Wait for production to complete before attempting to collect products

### Research related errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify research prerequisites are met before starting new research

### Production stoppages
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Keep fuel levels maintained in burner entities
- Monitor ingredient shortages in assembling machines

### Resource shortages
- Maintain adequate coal supply for burner entities
- Keep input materials stocked for assembling machines
- Monitor output chests to prevent overflow
